thread.title: Yakuza 5 is set to make its Western debut next month - Gaming
thread.title_full: Yakuza 5 is set to make its Western debut next month - Gaming News - Digital Spy

author: Albaraa Fahmy
title: Yakuza 5 is set to make its Western debut next month - Gaming
text: Yakuza 5 fans will finally be able to get their hands on the PlayStation 3 game.Sega's action-adventure title, which launched way back in 2012 in Japan, is scheduled to make its Western debut sometime next month. Â© SEGA The news was announced via the publisher's official blog, which lists the 'top five movies to get hyped for Yakuza 5' - including the likes of Tokyo Drifter and Pulp Fiction.Yakuza 5 continues Kazuma Kiryu's story and features four other protagonists - Taiga Saejima, Shun Akiyama, Haruka and newcomer Tatsuo Shinada.It takes place across five major Japanese cities, as players venture through a life of crime and power.Read our review of Yakuza 4Check out our most anticipated games of October, one of many videos in Digital Spy's dedicated Gaming YouTube channel. Be sure to subscribe!
